• Eikon search string for individual stock moves: STXBZ
  • The Day Ahead newsletter: http://tmsnrt.rs/2ggOmBi
  • The Morning News Call newsletter: http://tmsnrt.rs/2fwPLTh

The S&P 500 and Nasdaq 100 futures bounced back on Friday as Amazon.com Inc's robust earnings for the holiday reason lifted the mood at the end of a week of volatile trading that saw mixed earnings from Big Tech firms. .N


At 6:36 a.m. ET, Dow e-minis 1YMc1 were down 0.45% at 34,815. S&P 500 e-minis ESc1 were down 0.10% at 4,464.75, while Nasdaq 100 e-minis NQc1 were up 0.56% at 14,573.5.

The top three NYSE percentage gainers premarket .PRPG.NQ:
** Snap Inc <SNAP.N>, up 47.2%
** Bill.Com Hld Drc <BILL.N>, up 24.8%
** Party City Holdco Inc <PRTY.N>, up 15.1%

The top three NYSE percentage losers premarket .PRPL.NQ:
** Clorox Co <CLX.N>, down 13.2%
** Lannett Company Inc <LCI.N>, down 10.6%
** Graphic Packaging Holding Co <GPK.N>, down 8.9%

The top Nasdaq percentage gainer premarket .PRPG.O:
** Better Therapeutics Inc <BTTX.O>, up 17.6%

The top Nasdaq percentage loser premarket .PRPL.O:
** Soleno Therapeutics Inc <SLNO.O>, down 17.6%



** Snap Inc SNAP.N: up 47.2% premarket
BUZZ-Set for its best day after bright forecast (Full Story)


** Ford Motor Co F.N: down 6.3% premarket
BUZZ-Slips after Q4 earnings miss estimates (Full Story)


** Clorox Co CLX.N: down 13.2% premarket
BUZZ-Tumbles as brokerages cut PT following dour forecast (Full Story)


** Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O: up 11.0% premarket
BUZZ-Amazon shares on cloud nine as analysts laud AWS growth (Full Story)


** Pinterest Inc PINS.N: up 13.5% premarket
BUZZ-Set for best day in 15 months after Q4 results beat (Full Story)



(Compiled by Ananya Mariam Rajesh in Bengaluru)
